name: Saint Patrick's Day Break
description:
Saint Patrick's Day Break is a retro arcade break out game with animated characters, powerups and custom music. Break Saint Patrick’s Day characters, objects, icons, and beers with a shamrock ball and paddle. Break your way thru the 30 levels. Saint Patrick's Day Break has simple controls and retro arcade action. Collect all the Saint Patrick’s Day powerups to stack powerups on your paddle and ball. (Laser, Fireball, Multi-ball, Sticky paddle, Mega Bomb, Wide paddle, Shield and Invincible paddle)

Try to beat your high score and complete all the levels.
